summary: BRAKE POWER ASSIST FAILED. DEALER NOTIFIED.   *AK   THE BRAKES WERE SOFT UPON COLD STARTS AND WAS DISFUNCTIONAL UNTIL THE VEHICLE HAD WARMED UP.  THE BRAKE WAS DEPRESSED MULTIPLE TIMES.  THE DEALER ATTEMPTED ON FIVE OCCASIONS TO CORRECT THE PROBLEM AND REPLACED THE VACUUM HOSE TWICE.  A REPRESENTATIVE OF VOLVO RECOMMENDED NEW WIRING AND IT SEEMED TO HAVE REMEDIED THE PROBLEM.   *SCC  *JB
